comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I think this might be at Brooklyn Navy Yard, Dry Dock 4, which looks like this today: Phot by flickr user HLIT www.flickr.com/photos/29311691@N05/

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/artolog] 
Good call, artolog.  Here is a 1918 photo of the USS New Mexico (BB-40) in Dry Dock 4 from a similar perspective as one of the ARA Moreno photos in the most recent LOC Bain postings.

The photo is from the Brooklyn Navy Yard Development Corporation's (BNYDC) photostream:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/brooklynnavyyard/2401881300/]

And here's one of the most recent posted LOC Bain photos of ARA Moreno:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6265948737/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: captainslack, artolog and TVL1970:  Its great to have the Brooklyn Navy Yard location of this ship confirmed and more information about it.  Thank you for adding to our description!
